summary: The test package contains a comprehensive collection of unit and integration tests for the VizTracer library, covering core tracing functionality, commandâ€‘line interface, logging, multiprocessing, multithreading, Jupyter integration, remote management, report generation, compression, performance benchmarking, and regression verification.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, stability, and performance of VizTracer across diverse execution environments and usage scenarios, ensuring that new changes do not introduce bugs and that all advertised features work as expected.
